Which of the following statements are true regarding the film that addresses the forced marriage practice in Bihar?
Options:
A. a) The film was inspired by the high rates of abductions for forced marriages in Bihar.
B. b) The movie was filmed in Lucknow, Barabanki, and Raebareli.
C. c) The film's writer was unaware of the forced marriage practice before creating the story.
D. d) The film highlights the issue of forced marriages in Bihar.
Correct Answer: a) The film was inspired by the high rates of abductions for forced marriages in Bihar., b) The movie was filmed in Lucknow, Barabanki, and Raebareli., d) The film highlights the issue of forced marriages in Bihar.
